Module: markdown

markdown

require("markdown")(data, settings) → {String}

Format/convert result of search into Markdown.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object Result of search.
settings Object Format settings. See format for details.

Returns:
Markdown text representing result of search.

String
Module that provides formatter to convert result of search into Markdown.
